metadata.title: Data & AI Practice Overview
metadata.overview: Many financial services firms struggle to realize tangible ROI from their data and AI investments due to regulatory complexity and unclear outcomes. Eliassen Group's Data & AI practice provides proven, outcome-driven frameworks that de-risk these initiatives and deliver measurable value in months, not years.

email.subject: De-risking Your Data & AI Investments
email.body:
Hi [Prospect Name],

Many data modernization projects in the financial sector run over budget and fail to deliver the expected business value. Itâ€™s a common challenge when balancing innovation with security and complex regulations.

Our approach at Eliassen Group is different. We focus on delivering measurable outcomes with a proven, value-first methodology. We prioritize initiatives that generate clear returns and de-risk your investment.

For example, we partnered with a leading wealth management firm to modernize their data platform. This initiative reduced their time-to-insight by more than 70% and cut infrastructure costs by 45%, achieving a positive ROI in under six months.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute call next week to discuss how this value-focused approach could apply to your current data initiatives?

Best,
[Your Name]

phone.opening: Hi [Prospect Name], this is [Your Name] with the Data & AI practice at Eliassen Group.
phone.key_message: We specialize in helping financial firms get measurable returns from their data projects quickly and safely, avoiding the common pitfalls of budget overruns and compliance issues.
phone.evidence_point: We recently helped a regional bank modernize their data platform, which cut their reporting time from weeks to days and is projected to reduce their operational overhead by more than $1.5 million annually.
phone.engagement_question: What's the biggest challenge you're facing right now in demonstrating clear value from your data and AI investments?
phone.voicemail: Hi [Prospect Name], this is [Your Name] from Eliassen Group. We recently helped a regional bank save over $1.5 million annually by modernizing their data platform. I'd be happy to share how. You can reach me at [phone number].

linkedin.connection_request: Hi [Prospect Name], your role in the financial services space is impressive. I specialize in data & AI initiatives that deliver measurable ROI for firms like yours and enjoy connecting with peers in the industry.
linkedin.inmessage_subject: Data & AI ROI in Financial Services
linkedin.inmessage_body:
Hi [Prospect Name],

I'm reaching out because you're leading data initiatives at [Company]. Many of our clients express frustration with projects that don't produce clear business value.

We recently helped a regional bank cut their reporting time from weeks to days, saving them more than $1.5 million annually in operational costs. This is the kind of tangible outcome our team focuses on.

Could you spare 15 minutes for a brief call to explore how a similar approach could benefit your team?

Best,
[Your Name]

objections.objection: We already have a large consulting firm we work with.
objections.response: That's great, we often work alongside larger firms. Our value is in our specialized, hands-on approach which often accelerates delivery timelines. We helped one client, also working with a major firm, launch their data platform 40% faster than planned.

objections.objection: We're focused on cost reduction, not new initiatives.
objections.response: I understand completely. Our data modernization work is a powerful cost-reduction tool. We've helped financial institutions reduce their data infrastructure costs by more than 40% through targeted cloud migration and optimization.

objections.objection: We're concerned about regulatory compliance with new data initiatives.
objections.response: That's a valid concern, as compliance mistakes can be very costly. We integrate regulatory controls for GDPR, FINRA, etc., directly into the data architecture. For one client, this not only ensured compliance but also sped up their audit reporting by 60%.

objections.objection: We don't have the internal expertise to maintain advanced solutions.
objections.response: We hear that often, and building your team's skill is key to long-term success. Our engagements are designed for knowledge transfer. We recently got a client's team fully independent on a new analytics platform in just eight weeks.

collateral.title: Case Study: Achieving 45% Cost Reduction in Data Modernization
